page.pg_title: Tasks to perform under the Map Search tab

text_content.paragraph: You can perform many map-related tasks in the Map tab.

graphic.alt: Left: Graphic labeled Search Types: Detail Assets, Landgrid, Location. Right: Graphic labeled Search Results Interactions: Manage layers, Identify features, Sort by field, Sort by hyperlinks, Export search results to Excel, and Identify Features using a “Buffer Tool”

page.prompt: CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.

cc_text.paragraph: You can perform many map-related tasks in the Map tab. In addition to searching for map by running a saved search you can conduct these types of searches:
Once search results populate the Data Grid, you have many options at your disposal to interact with results in these ways:

bullets.bullet: Export search results to Excel, and
